description: No root required Android DNS modifier and Hosts/DNSMasq resolver This application can create a VPN tunnel to modify the DNS settings on Android. Features * No root access required, no ads contained * Functional under data connection * A tester for DNS servers * IPv6 support (including Rules!) * Custom DNS server * Custom hosts and DNSMasq configuration * EXTREME LOW power consume * Material Design Supported DNS Query Methods: * UDP * TCP * DNS over TLS (RFC7858) * DNS over HTTPS (RFC8484) * DNS over HTTPS (Google JSON) Users must comply with local laws and regulations. Read more: Wiki
